summary.incident:
Augusto Batalla (Rayo Vallecano) goes into
the referee's book for dissent.

Having seen unsporting behavior, Mateo Busquets
shows a yellow card to one of the players
sitting on the bench. And Oscar Trejo (Rayo
Vallecano) is the recipient.

Goal! Lamine Yamal (Barcelona) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Augusto Batalla into the bottom
left corner.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Unai Lopez (Rayo Vallecano) was quite
harsh and Mateo Busquets didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Jules Kounde (Barcelona) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Here is a change. Unai Lopez (Rayo Vallecano)
is going off and Inigo Perez gives the last
tactical orders to Fran Perez.

Substitution. Marcus Rashford (Barcelona)
replaces Raphinha.

Hansi Flick decides to make a substitution.
Dani Olmo will be replaced by Fermin Lopez
(Barcelona).

The ball hits the back of the net! Isi Palazon
delivers a superb cross from the corner
kick, Fran Perez (Rayo Vallecano) finds
himself some space inside the box and unleashes
an unstoppable shot. His effort goes in
off the crossbar and past the helpless goalkeeper.
1:1.

Inigo Perez is forced to make a change.
Luiz Felipe (Rayo Vallecano) is unable to
continue due to injury, Oscar Valentin comes
on.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Sergio Camello (Rayo
Vallecano) is coming onto the pitch as Jorge
de Frutos cannot continue after picking
up an injury.

It is time for a substitution. Gerard Martin
is on for Alejandro Balde (Barcelona).

The substitution is prepared. Robert Lewandowski
joins the action as a substitute, replacing
Ferran Torres (Barcelona).

That will be all from Isi Palazon who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Pacha
(Rayo Vallecano).

Inigo Perez prepares a substitution. Alvaro
Garcia (Rayo Vallecano) is replaced by Gerard
Gumbau.

The referee Mateo Busquets awards Pep Chavarria
(Rayo Vallecano) a yellow card.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Exposito (Espanyol) was quite harsh and
Miguel Sesma didn't hesitate to show him
a yellow card.

Goal! Carlos Romero (Espanyol) fires the
rebound into the bottom right corner after
the ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 1:0.

Victor Munoz (Osasuna) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Miguel Sesma had an easy-decision
to make.

The substitution is prepared. Urko Gonzalez
joins the action as a substitute, replacing
Exposito (Espanyol).

Here is a change. Kike Garcia is going off
and Manolo Gonzalez gives the last tactical
orders to Roberto Fernandez Jaen (Espanyol).

Alessio Lisci has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Ruben Garcia (Osasuna) replacing
Moi Gomez.

Alessio Lisci prepares a substitution. Victor
Munoz is replaced by Raul Garcia (Osasuna).

Manolo Gonzalez decides to make a substitution.
Pere Milla (Espanyol) will be replaced by
Ramon Terrats.

Manolo Gonzalez has decided to substitute
Tyrhys Dolan (Espanyol) and he is replaced
by Luca Koleosho.

Alessio Lisci has decided to make a change.
Kike Barja (Osasuna) replaces Jon Moncayola.

Alessio Lisci has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Iker Benito replacing Juan Cruz
(Osasuna).

Javi Puado (Espanyol) receives a yellow
card from the referee as expected.

Today's match ends for Javi Puado who will
be replaced by Miguel Rubio (Espanyol).

Miguel Sesma shows a yellow card to Iker
Benito (Osasuna) for his blatant foul.

Lucas Torro (Osasuna) has tested the patience
of referee Miguel Sesma and goes into the
book for a previous late challenge.

Isidro Diaz shows a yellow card to Benat
Prados Diaz (Ath Bilbao) for his blatant
foul.

What bad luck! Marc Bartra (Betis) got in
the way of a pass and unintentionally sent
the ball past his own goalkeeper. The score
is 0:1.

That will be all from Benat Prados Diaz
who is being replaced by the fresh legs
of Mikel Vesga (Ath Bilbao).

Dani Vivian (Ath Bilbao) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Isidro Diaz had
an easy-decision to make.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Pablo Garcia leaves the
pitch and Cedric Bakambu (Betis) comes on.

The game has come to an end for Rodrigo
Riquelme. He has contributed as much as
he could today. He will be replaced by the
fresh legs of Nelson Deossa (Betis).

Ernesto Valverde has decided to make a change.
Maroan Sannadi (Ath Bilbao) replaces Inaki
Williams.

Ernesto Valverde prepares a substitution.
Jesus Areso is replaced by Andoni Gorosabel
(Ath Bilbao).

Substitution. Unai Gomez (Ath Bilbao) has
come on for Oihan Sancet.

Nico Williams will be replaced by Robert
Navarro (Ath Bilbao).

Robert Navarro showcases his great technique
and produces a beautiful lofted cross into
the box. Aitor Paredes (Ath Bilbao) meets
the cross and gets himself onto the scoresheet
with a header inside the right post. It's
0:2.

The substitution is prepared. Hector Bellerin
(Betis) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Angel Ortiz.

Manuel Pellegrini decides to make a substitution.
Giovani Lo Celso will be replaced by Chimy
Avila (Betis).

Junior Firpo sends a superb cross into the
box. Cedric Bakambu (Betis) latches on to
it and from near the penalty spot powers
a header inside the right post, leaving
Unai Simon beaten. He displayed his eye
for goal there - excellent finish. The score
is 1:2.

Maroan Sannadi (Ath Bilbao) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

There is a red card in the referee's hand.
It points straight to Alex Padilla (Ath
Bilbao), who has to leave the pitch immediately.

Junior Firpo (Betis) receives a yellow card
for chasing the referee and shouting at
him.

Alex Berenguer (Ath Bilbao) was probably
a bit loose with his words to Isidro Diaz,
who decides to show him a yellow.

Goal! Etta Eyong displays great vision and
sends a pass to Nicolas Pepe (Villarreal),
who shows brilliant composure inside the
box to bury the ball from close range in
the back of the net. The score is 0:1.

It is time for a substitution. Borja Iglesias
(Celta Vigo) is on for Bryan Zaragoza.

Claudio Giraldez decides to make a substitution.
Pablo Duran will be replaced by Hugo Alvarez
(Celta Vigo).

Miguel Roman (Celta Vigo) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Alberto Moleiro walks off the pitch
to be replaced by Thomas Partey (Villarreal).

Claudio Giraldez has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Ilaix Moriba (Celta Vigo)
replacing Miguel Roman.

Substitution. Williot Swedberg (Celta Vigo)
replaces Iago Aspas.

Yellow card. Pape Gueye (Villarreal) goes
into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.

Claudio Giraldez has decided to make a change.
Oscar Mingueza (Celta Vigo) replaces Javier
Rodriguez.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Pape Gueye will be replaced by Dani Parejo
(Villarreal).

A substitution has been made. Etta Eyong
goes off and Tanitoluwa Oluwaseyi (Villarreal)
comes on.

Here is a change. Tajon Buchanan is going
off and Marcelino gives the last tactical
orders to Ilias Akhomach (Villarreal).

It's time for a substitution. Renato Veiga
(Villarreal) comes on in place of Nicolas
Pepe.

GOAL! Javier Rueda connects with a delightful
cross and heads it towards Borja Iglesias
(Celta Vigo), whose header goes past Luiz
Junior. 1:1.

Celebrations are cut short for Real Madrid
as the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was offside!

Pablo Torre takes the corner and Vedat Muriqi
(Mallorca) rises highest near the penalty
spot to plant a brilliant header into the
right side of the goal. The score is 0:1.

Arda Guler (Real Madrid) scores with a header.
Despite the ball going into the middle of
the goal, the goalkeeper was unable to pull
off a save.

Goal! Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid) weaves
his way past opponents, and he unleashes
a magnificent effort from the edge of the
box into the bottom right corner. Leo Roman
had no chance of reaching it. The score
is 2:1.

The goal by Real Madrid won't count as it
has been disallowed due to offside on the
advice of the video assistant referee!

Celebrations are cut short for Real Madrid
as the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was handball!

It is time for a substitution. Samu Costa
(Mallorca) is on for Pablo Torre.

Xabi Alonso has decided to make a change.
Brahim Diaz (Real Madrid) replaces Franco
Mastantuono.

Dean Huijsen (Real Madrid) will have to
be careful for the rest of the match as
he is shown a yellow card.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Arda Guler walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Dani Ceballos (Real Madrid).

Xabi Alonso prepares a substitution. Vinicius
Junior is replaced by Rodrygo (Real Madrid).

Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Trent
Alexander-Arnold.

The substitution is prepared. Johan Mojica
(Mallorca) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Toni Lato.

Jagoba Arrasate has decided to substitute
Mateu Morey Bauza and he is replaced by
Antonio Sanchez (Mallorca).

Substitution. Takuma Asano (Mallorca) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Mateo Joseph walks
off.

Jagoba Arrasate has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Jan Virgili (Mallorca)
replacing Manu Morlanes.

Eder Militao (Real Madrid) has tested the
patience of referee Jose Sanchez and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Kylian Mbappe will be replaced by Gonzalo
Garcia (Real Madrid).

Matias Almeyda is forced to make a change.
Chidera Ejuke is unable to continue due
to injury, Juanlu Sanchez (Sevilla) comes
on.

Goal! Ruben Vargas tees up Alfonso Gonzalez
(Sevilla) on the edge of the box and he
fires the ball into the bottom left corner.
0:1.

Goal! Ruben Vargas slips a clever pass through
to Isaac Romero (Sevilla), who moves inside
the box and sends a measured shot beyond
the keeper and into the bottom right corner.
0:2.

Michel prepares a substitution. Arnau Martinez
is replaced by Hugo Rincon (Girona).

Substitution. Cristhian Stuani leaves the
pitch and is replaced by Dawda Camara (Girona).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Daley
Blind (Girona) for David Lopez.
Lucien Agoume (Sevilla) is yellow-carded.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Manuel Bueno Sebastian (Sevilla)
is coming onto the pitch as Ruben Vargas
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Michel has decided to introduce fresh legs,
with Portu (Girona) replacing Axel Witsel.

Substitution. Thomas Lemar will be replaced
by Jhon Elmer Solis Romero (Girona).

That's the end of the game for Lucien Agoume,
who is replaced by Marcao (Sevilla).

Matias Almeyda has decided to substitute
Isaac Romero and he is replaced by Peque
(Sevilla).

Orjan Nyland (Sevilla) violates the laws
of the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

home_team:
van de Beek D.
Achilles Tendon Injury

summary.incident:
Veljko Paunovic is forced to make a change.
Ilyas Chaira (R. Oviedo) is not able to
carry on due to injury. He is replaced by
Haissem Hassan.

Goal! A precise cut back on the goal line
from Haissem Hassan finds Leander Dendoncker
(R. Oviedo) right in front of goal, and
he easily buries the ball into the top right
corner. 1:0.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Duje Caleta-Car (Real Sociedad) was quite
harsh and Adrian Cordero didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Substitution. Brais Mendez (Real Sociedad)
in, Orri Oskarsson out.

Sergio Francisco has decided to substitute
Pablo Marin and he is replaced by Jon Karrikaburu
(Real Sociedad).

It is time for a substitution. Salomon Rondon
(R. Oviedo) is on for Federico Vinas.

Veljko Paunovic has decided to make a change.
Santi Cazorla (R. Oviedo) replaces Oviemuno
Ejaria.

The game has come to an end for Takefusa
Kubo. He has contributed as much as he could
today. He will be replaced by the fresh
legs of Goncalo Guedes (Real Sociedad).

Sergio Francisco is forced to make an unplanned
substitution as Aihen Munoz suffers an injury
and Sergio Gomez (Real Sociedad) comes on.

Alberto Reina (R. Oviedo) has picked up
an injury and is replaced by Kwasi Sibo.

Veljko Paunovic prepares a substitution.
Luka Ilic is replaced by Josip Brekalo (R.
Oviedo).

That's the end of the game for Jon Gorrotxategi,
who is replaced by Benat Turrientes (Real
Sociedad).

Here is a change. Mikel Oyarzabal is going
off and Sergio Francisco gives the last
tactical orders to Luka Sucic (Real Sociedad).

Josip Brekalo (R. Oviedo) makes a bad tackle
on his opponent and is angry when the referee
shows him a deserved yellow card.

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Haissem Hassan (R. Oviedo)
is given a yellow card.

Goal! Giuliano Simeone (Atl. Madrid) fires
the rebound into the bottom right corner
after the ball breaks to him in the box.
The score is 0:1.

Goal! Carlos Vicente (Alaves) wins the battle
of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty
past Jan Oblak into right side of the goal.

The foul by Johnny Cardoso (Atl. Madrid)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Victor Garcia.

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Moussa
Diarra (Alaves).

Victor Garcia shows the yellow card to Alexander
Sorloth (Atl. Madrid) for a heavy challenge.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Victor Parada (Alaves)
will replace Jon Guridi.

Problems for Eduardo Coudet as Moussa Diarra
(Alaves) is not able to play anymore. His
injury is too serious and Ander Guevara
replaces him.

It will be a substitution. Matteo Ruggeri
(Atl. Madrid) is ready to enter the pitch
as Johnny Cardoso walks off.

It's time for a substitution. Conor Gallagher
(Atl. Madrid) comes on in place of David
Hancko.

Here is a change. Thiago Almada is going
off and Diego Simeone gives the last tactical
orders to Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Pablo Ibanez trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Carlos Protesoni
(Alaves).

Substitution. Mariano Diaz (Alaves) in,
Toni Martinez out.

Victor Parada (Alaves) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Victor Garcia didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Diego Simeone has decided to make a change.
Giacomo Raspadori (Atl. Madrid) replaces
Julian Alvarez.

It is time for a substitution. Koke (Atl.
Madrid) is on for Giuliano Simeone.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Denis Suarez (Alaves) is
coming onto the pitch as Carlos Protesoni
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Koke (Atl. Madrid) is awarded a yellow card
for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree
with the decision, but Victor Garcia ignores
the protests.

Luis Rioja takes over corner duties and
expertly finds Mouctar Diakhaby (Valencia),
who jumps highest and coolly plants a bullet
header into the top right corner. The score
is now 1:0.

Javi Guerra (Valencia) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Francisco Maeso didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Goal! Javi Guerra slips a clever pass through
to Arnaut Danjuma (Valencia), who moves
inside the box and sends a measured shot
beyond the keeper and into the right side
of the goal. 2:0.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Davinchi will be replaced by Coba da Costa
(Getafe).

Jose Bordalas Jimenez has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Borja Mayoral (Getafe)
replacing Mario Martin.

Carlos Corberan decides to make a substitution.
Javi Guerra will be replaced by Pepelu (Valencia).

A substitution has been made. Arnaut Danjuma
goes off and Dani Raba (Valencia) comes
on.

Substitution. Diego Lopez walks off the
pitch and Jose Copete (Valencia) comes on
as a substitute.

Francisco Maeso shows a yellow card to Mouctar
Diakhaby (Valencia) for a tough tackle.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Luis Rioja as he is
replaced by Largie Ramazani (Valencia).

Goal! Hugo Duro (Valencia) finds himself
some space inside the box to get on the
end of a pass from Largie Ramazani, then
sends the ball into the middle of the net.
3:0.

Iosu Galech shows a yellow card to Dela
(Levante) for a tough tackle.

A yellow card for a tackle by Jeremy Toljan
(Levante). Iosu Galech doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Rafa Mir (Elche) finishes his beautiful
individual effort with a superb strike from
inside the box. Mathew Ryan is just a bystander
as the ball flies into the top left corner.
The score is 1:0.

Rodrigo Mendoza (Elche) picks up the ball
on the edge of the penalty box and produces
a moment of magic with a brilliant shot
that goes into the left side of the goal!

Rodrigo Mendoza (Elche) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Iosu Galech didn't think
twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

Substitution. Jorge Cabello will be replaced
by Jose Morales (Levante).

Here is a change. Rafa Mir is going off
and Eder Sarabia gives the last tactical
orders to Mourad El Ghezouani (Elche).

Substitution. Jon Ander Olasagasti (Levante)
has come on for Carlos Alvarez.

Substitution. Jeremy Toljan makes his way
off the pitch and Victor Garcia (Levante)
comes on as his replacement.

Eder Sarabia has decided to make a change.
Martim Neto (Elche) replaces Marc Aguado.

The substitution is prepared. Andre Silva
(Elche) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Alvaro Rodriguez.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Ivan Romero will be replaced by Carlos Espi
(Levante).

Julian Calero has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Iker Losada (Levante) replacing
Manu Sanchez.

Substitution. German Valera makes way for
Leo Petrot (Elche).

Federico Redondo Solari (Elche) joins the
action as a substitute, replacing Rodrigo
Mendoza.

Sergi Altimira (Betis) is shown a yellow
card by the referee for making a challenge
on his opponent, but he looks angry with
the decision.

The ball was swung into the box by Giovani
Lo Celso from the corner kick. He perfectly
found the head of Marc Bartra (Betis), who
planted a long-range header inside the right
post to make the score 0:1.

Claudio Giraldez has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Javier Rueda
comes on the pitch for Williot Swedberg
(Celta Vigo).

Goal! Hugo Alvarez (Celta Vigo) picks up
the ball from a rebound and from the edge
of the box he unleashes a low shot into
the middle of the net. Alvaro Valles is
unable to keep the ball out of the net.
It's 1:1.

Manuel Pellegrini is forced to make a change.
Aitor Ruibal is not able to carry on due
to injury. He is replaced by Pablo Garcia
(Betis).

Claudio Giraldez decides to make a substitution.
Mihailo Ristic will be replaced by Marcos
Alonso (Celta Vigo).

A substitution has been made. Borja Iglesias
is replaced by Ferran Jutgla (Celta Vigo).

Manuel Pellegrini prepares a substitution.
Rodrigo Riquelme is replaced by Cedric Bakambu
(Betis).

It's time for a substitution. Chimy Avila
(Betis) comes on in place of Sergi Altimira.

Cucho Hernandez goes off the pitch and Valentin
Gomez (Betis) comes on.

Here comes a substitution. Hugo Alvarez
(Celta Vigo) is given a rest as he is replaced
by Bryan Zaragoza.

Substitution. Pablo Duran (Celta Vigo) is
replaced by Iago Aspas.

Yoel Lago (Celta Vigo) shouldn't be surprised
it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the
situation down well.

Here is a change. Giovani Lo Celso is going
off and Manuel Pellegrini gives the last
tactical orders to Daniel Perez Guerrero
(Betis).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Pablo Garcia (Betis) was quite harsh
and Jesus Manzano didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Goal - 0:1! Adrian Liso (Getafe) gets a
shot away from the edge of the box and scores
into the bottom left corner. Luis Milla
provided an assist for the goal.

It's an own goal! An unlucky moment for
Juan Antonio Iglesias Sanchez (Getafe),
who tries to clear a cross into the six-yard
box but heads the ball behind his own keeper.
The score is 1:1.

Adrian Liso (Getafe) takes a great first
touch to control a killer pass on the edge
of the box and drills a shot into the bottom
left corner in trademark fashion.

Jose Angel Carmona (Sevilla) receives a
yellow card for talking out of turn to the
referee.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Ruben Vargas departs the
field of play to be replaced by Peque (Sevilla).

The referee had an easy-decision to make.
A yellow card is given to Mauro Arambarri
(Getafe) for a foul that he committed a
little earlier.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Isaac Romero (Sevilla)
comes onto the pitch so that Chidera Ejuke
can be given a rest.

Peque (Sevilla) has tested the patience
of referee Isidro Diaz and goes into the
book for a previous late challenge.

Mario Martin (Getafe) makes a bad challenge
and receives a yellow card. The referee
had no doubt.

That's the end of the game for Juanlu Sanchez,
who is replaced by Adria Pedrosa (Sevilla).

Substitution. Luis Milla makes his way off
the pitch and Ismael Bekhoucha (Getafe)
comes on as his replacement.

Andrei Ratiu (Rayo Vallecano) shouldn't
be surprised it's a yellow from the ref,
who cooled the situation down well.

Unai Lopez (Rayo Vallecano) takes out his
opponent with a nasty challenge and is relieved
when the referee only gives him a booking.

Half-time substitution. Ernesto Valverde
decided to make a change. Maroan Sannadi
is replaced by Oihan Sancet (Ath Bilbao).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Unai Lopez trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Gerard Gumbau (Rayo
Vallecano).

Inigo Perez prepares a substitution. Pedro
Diaz is replaced by Fran Perez (Rayo Vallecano).

Goal! Oihan Sancet (Ath Bilbao) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty low past Augusto Batalla into the
middle of the goal.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Inigo Ruiz de Galarreta walks off the
pitch to be replaced by Benat Prados Diaz
(Ath Bilbao).

Alvaro Garcia (Rayo Vallecano) criticises
the decision of the referee and immediately
receives a yellow card.

Pep Chavarria (Rayo Vallecano) sees a yellow
card. He should be more careful because
one more challenge like that could result
in a red card.

Inigo Perez has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Sergio Camello (Rayo Vallecano)
replacing Isi Palazon.

It is time for a substitution. Randy Nteka
(Rayo Vallecano) is on for Jorge de Frutos.

The substitution is prepared. Gorka Guruzeta
(Ath Bilbao) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Inaki Williams.

Here is a change. Pep Chavarria is going
off and Inigo Perez gives the last tactical
orders to Oscar Trejo (Rayo Vallecano).

Ernesto Valverde has decided to make a change.
Mikel Vesga (Ath Bilbao) replaces Alex Berenguer.

Substitution. Unai Gomez (Ath Bilbao) has
come on for Nico Williams.

Goal! Arda Guler plays a long ball to Kylian
Mbappe (Real Madrid), who cuts inside and
unleashes a screamer into the bottom left
corner. The keeper had no chance. Superb
strike! 0:1.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Veljko Paunovic probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Oier Luengo (R. Oviedo). He is replaced
by Haissem Hassan.

A substitution has been made. Rodrygo goes
off and Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid) comes
on.

Xabi Alonso has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Brahim Diaz (Real Madrid) replacing
Franco Mastantuono.

Luka Ilic (R. Oviedo) violates the laws
of the game and is shown a deserved yellow
card by the referee.

Dani Calvo (R. Oviedo) gives the referee
no choice but to show him a yellow card.

That's the end of the game for Luka Ilic,
who is replaced by Oviemuno Ejaria (R. Oviedo).

Veljko Paunovic decides to make a substitution.
Salomon Rondon will be replaced by Federico
Vinas (R. Oviedo).

Xabi Alonso has decided to substitute Arda
Guler and he is replaced by Gonzalo Garcia
(Real Madrid).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Josip Brekalo (R. Oviedo)
comes onto the pitch so that Ilyas Chaira
can be given a rest.

Ricardo De Burgos rightly pulls out a yellow
card and shows it to Vinicius Junior (Real
Madrid).

Goal! A precise cut back on the goal line
from Vinicius Junior finds Kylian Mbappe
(Real Madrid) right in front of goal, and
he easily buries the ball into the bottom
right corner. 0:2.

Here comes a substitution. Daniel Carvajal
is given a rest as he is replaced by Trent
Alexander-Arnold (Real Madrid).

Xabi Alonso has decided to make a change.
Dani Ceballos (Real Madrid) replaces Kylian
Mbappe.

Substitution. Santi Cazorla (R. Oviedo)
in, Leander Dendoncker out.

Goal! Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid) beautifully
controls a strongly hit pass from Brahim
Diaz inside the box. He cuts inside his
marker and rifles the ball into the bottom
right corner. 0:3.

The ball hits the back of the net! Roberto
Fernandez Jaen showcases his brilliant technique
and produces a beautiful lofted cross into
the box. Pere Milla (Espanyol) gets onto
the scoresheet by sweetly heading it low
inside the right post – 0:1.

Penalty saved! Javi Puado (Espanyol) sends
the penalty towards the left hand side of
the goal, but Alex Remiro pulls off a wonderful
save to deny him.

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Exposito (Espanyol) is given
a yellow card.

Goal! Javi Puado (Espanyol) runs up to the
ball, stops and waits for Alex Remiro to
commit before slotting the penalty into
the roof of the net.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Orri Oskarsson (Real Sociedad)
comes onto the pitch for Luka Sucic.

Sergio Francisco has decided to substitute
Benat Turrientes and he is replaced by Jon
Gorrotxategi (Real Sociedad).

Ander Barrenetxea (Real Sociedad) picks
it up in space and from the edge of the
box lashes in a shot that is deflected past
the helpless Marko Dmitrovic. 1:2.

Fantastic team goal! Orri Oskarsson (Real
Sociedad) was set free in the area by Mikel
Oyarzabal and he made no mistake with a
lovely finish into the bottom left corner.
2:2.

Pere Milla comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Ramon Terrats (Espanyol).

Manolo Gonzalez has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Kike Garcia (Espanyol)
replacing Roberto Fernandez Jaen.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Fernando Calero (Espanyol)
will replace Pol Lozano.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Aihen Munoz (Real Sociedad)
comes onto the pitch so that Sergio Gomez
can be given a rest.

Substitution. Mikel Oyarzabal makes his
way off the pitch and Brais Mendez (Real
Sociedad) comes on as his replacement.

Jon Gorrotxategi (Real Sociedad) is cautioned
by the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

It's a yellow card for Jon Martin (Real
Sociedad).

Ander Barrenetxea will be replaced by Goncalo
Guedes (Real Sociedad).

Manolo Gonzalez has decided to make a change.
Jose Salinas (Espanyol) replaces Exposito.

Substitution. Antoniu Roca (Espanyol) on
for Tyrhys Dolan.

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Fernando
Calero (Espanyol).

Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the
opponent which has gifted a chance to Nicolas
Pepe (Villarreal), who rolls the ball into
the back of the net from close range. 1:0.

That's a goal we will see over and over
again. Tajon Buchanan (Villarreal) scores
a beauty into the top left corner from a
stunning cross. Put your own superlative
here.

Yeremy Pino sends a precise lofted cross
into the box. Rafa Marin (Villarreal) latches
on to it and finishes with a quick shot
inside the left post. The goalkeeper had
no chance. The score changes to 3:0.

Goal! Tajon Buchanan (Villarreal) pounced
on a loose ball inside the box and beats
the goalkeeper with a low shot into the
middle of the net. He makes it 4:0.

Michel is forced to make a change. Yangel
Herrera (Girona) is unable to continue due
to injury, David Lopez comes on.

Marcelino has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Thomas Partey
comes on the pitch for Santi Comesana (Villarreal).

The need to improve in the second half has
brought about a change. Juan Foyth (Villarreal)
comes off for Renato Veiga.

Half-time substitution. Michel decided to
make a change. Dawda Camara (Girona) is
replaced by Thomas Lemar.

The game is over for Portu (Girona). Alex
Moreno comes on for the second half.

Vitor Reis (Girona) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Guillermo Cuadra had an
easy-decision to make.

Guillermo Cuadra shows a yellow card to
Santiago Mourino (Villarreal) for his blatant
foul.

The referee had an easy-decision to make.
A yellow card is given to Ladislav Krejci
(Girona) for a foul that he committed a
little earlier.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Ilias Akhomach (Villarreal)
will replace Nicolas Pepe.

Tajon Buchanan (Villarreal) blasts the ball
towards goal from the edge of the penalty
box and it flies straight into the top right
corner of the net!

Here is a change. Pape Gueye is going off
and Marcelino gives the last tactical orders
to Dani Parejo (Villarreal).

It is time for a substitution. Alberto Moleiro
(Villarreal) is on for Yeremy Pino.

Michel has decided to substitute Jhon Elmer
Solis Romero and he is replaced by Ivan
Martin (Girona).

Substitution. Viktor Tsygankov did his best
and is replaced by Yaser Asprilla (Girona).

away_team:
van de Beek D.
Achilles Tendon Injury

summary.incident:
Ante Budimir (Osasuna) leaped to meet a
deep cross and nodded the ball past the
helpless goalkeeper.

Jose Gaya (Valencia) makes an ugly challenge
on his opponent and receives a red card
from the referee!

Substitution. Jesus Vazquez (Valencia) has
come on for Dani Raba.

Lucas Torro (Osasuna) is shown a yellow
card by the referee for making a challenge
on his opponent, but he looks angry with
the decision.

The substitution has been made. Ruben Garcia
(Osasuna) has replaced Victor Munoz.

Carlos Corberan has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Filip Ugrinic (Valencia)
replacing Javi Guerra.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Luis Rioja walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Mouctar Diakhaby (Valencia).

Cesar Tarrega (Valencia) is cautioned by
the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Substitution. Pepelu leaves the pitch and
is replaced by Baptiste Santamaria (Valencia).

Carlos Corberan has decided to make a change.
Hugo Duro (Valencia) replaces Jose Copete.

Alessio Lisci has decided to substitute
Aimar Oroz and he is replaced by Raul Garcia
(Osasuna).

Lucas Torro goes off the pitch and Jorge
Herrando (Osasuna) comes on.

It's like he was asking for a caution. Valentin
Rosier (Osasuna) receives a yellow card.

Substitution. Moi Gomez did his best and
is replaced by Asier Osambela (Osasuna).

Goal! Ivan Romero (Levante) finds himself
some space inside the box to get on the
end of a pass from Jeremy Toljan, then sends
the ball into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
Alejandro Balde (Barcelona) is yellow-carded.

Today's referee Alejandro Hernandez rightly
decides to book Pablo Martinez Andres (Levante)
for his harsh tackle.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Jose Morales (Levante) low into the right
of the net, giving goalkeeper Joan Garcia
no chance!

Hansi Flick makes a switch. Gavi is coming
on in place of Marc Casado (Barcelona) at
the start of the second period.

The game is over for Marcus Rashford (Barcelona).
Dani Olmo comes on for the second half.

Jose Morales (Levante) sees a yellow card
from Alejandro Hernandez after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

Goal! Lamine Yamal sets up Pedri (Barcelona)
for a shot on the edge of the box. He doesn't
hit the cleanest of shots, but the ball
somehow finds its way into the top right
corner. 2:1.

Raphinha produces a cross from the resulting
corner and finds Ferran Torres (Barcelona)
inside the box. He pulls the trigger and
scores, sending the ball into the top of
the net. What a brilliant finish. 2:2.

Here's the change. Jose Morales leaves the
pitch and Carlos Alvarez (Levante) comes
on as a substitute.

Julian Calero has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Iker Losada (Levante) replacing
Ivan Romero.

It will be a substitution. Carlos Espi (Levante)
is ready to enter the pitch as Roger Brugue
walks off.

Today's match ends for Manu Sanchez who
will be replaced by Diego Varela Pampin
(Levante).

Hansi Flick has decided to substitute Ronald
Araujo and he is replaced by Andreas Christensen
(Barcelona).

Substitution. Alejandro Balde is replaced
by Robert Lewandowski (Barcelona).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Jules Kounde (Barcelona)
will replace Eric Garcia.

Julian Calero has decided to make a change.
Victor Garcia (Levante) replaces Jeremy
Toljan.

A yellow card for a tackle by Diego Varela
Pampin (Levante). Alejandro Hernandez doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Unai Elgezabal Udondo (Levante) attempts
to head the ball away after a cross into
the penalty area, but instead he accidentally
sends it under the roof of his own goal.
The goalkeeper was helpless.

Goal! Alexander Sorloth (Atl. Madrid) beautifully
controls a strongly hit pass from David
Hancko inside the box. He cuts inside his
marker and rifles the ball into the bottom
right corner. 1:0.

Goal! Alvaro Rodriguez provides Rafa Mir
(Elche) with a nice pass inside the box.
It allows him to finish with a precise effort
into the bottom left corner. 1:1.

Aleix Febas (Elche) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Cesar Soto Grado didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Rodrigo Mendoza (Elche) sees a yellow card
from Cesar Soto Grado after he sent one
of the opposing players to the ground.

Eder Sarabia has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Victor Chust
(Elche) comes on the pitch for John Donald.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Andre Silva (Elche) is replacing Rafa Mir.

Eder Sarabia has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Martim Neto (Elche) replacing
Rodrigo Mendoza.

Diego Simeone decides to make a substitution.
Johnny Cardoso will be replaced by Antoine
Griezmann (Atl. Madrid).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Conor Gallagher (Atl. Madrid)
replaces Thiago Almada.

Here comes a substitution. Giacomo Raspadori
(Atl. Madrid) is brought on as a substitute
for Alexander Sorloth.

Substitution. Giuliano Simeone makes his
way off the pitch and Nahuel Molina (Atl.
Madrid) comes on as his replacement.

Diego Simeone has decided to substitute
Matteo Ruggeri and he is replaced by Javi
Galan (Atl. Madrid).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Pedro Bigas leaves the pitch
and Leo Petrot (Elche) comes on.

Here is a change. Marc Aguado is going off
and Eder Sarabia gives the last tactical
orders to Federico Redondo Solari (Elche).

The referee gives a yellow card to Matias
Dituro (Elche).

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Antonio
Sanchez (Mallorca).

Substitution. Antonio Sanchez makes his
way off the pitch and Marash Kumbulla (Mallorca)
comes on as his replacement.

Takuma Asano (Mallorca) earns the yellow
card.

Omar Mascarell (Mallorca) gets a yellow
card.

Here is a change. Manuel Fernandez is going
off and Claudio Giraldez gives the last
tactical orders to Javier Rodriguez (Celta
Vigo).

The game has come to an end for Iago Aspas.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Williot Swedberg (Celta Vigo).

Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) picks up a yellow
card for unsporting behaviour after the
half-time whistle. He should have gone straight
into the dressing room instead.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Mateo Joseph trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Abdon Prats (Mallorca).

Jagoba Arrasate has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Dani Rodriguez (Mallorca)
replacing Omar Mascarell.

Substitution. Takuma Asano is replaced by
Marc Domenech (Mallorca).

Booking. Hugo Sotelo (Celta Vigo) receives
a caution from the referee.

Claudio Giraldez has decided to substitute
Ferran Jutgla and he is replaced by Borja
Iglesias (Celta Vigo).

Substitution. Fran Beltran (Celta Vigo)
in, Hugo Sotelo out.

Carlos Dominguez (Celta Vigo) gets booked
for the first time in this match.

Substitution. Jan Salas (Mallorca) on for
Pablo Torre.

Goal! Mateu Morey Bauza (Mallorca) fires
the rebound into the top right corner after
the ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 1:1.

Substitution. Pablo Duran will be replaced
by Bryan Zaragoza (Celta Vigo).

Goal! The rebound fell to Giovani Lo Celso
(Betis) and he fired home from close range.
The score is 1:0.
Pablo Ibanez (Alaves) is yellow-carded.

The yellow card is received by Giovani Lo
Celso (Betis).

Here comes a substitution. Abderrahmane
Rebbach (Alaves) is brought on as a substitute
for Jon Guridi.

Eduardo Coudet decides to make a substitution.
Pablo Ibanez will be replaced by Ander Guevara
(Alaves).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Mariano Diaz (Alaves)
comes onto the pitch so that Toni Martinez
can be given a rest.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rodrigo Riquelme departs
the field of play to be replaced by Pablo
Garcia (Betis).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Ricardo Rodriguez (Betis)
replaces Junior Firpo.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Victor Parada walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Calebe (Alaves).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Facundo Garces (Alaves) was quite harsh
and Miguel Ortiz didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Antonio Blanco (Alaves) duly receives
a yellow card.

Cucho Hernandez (Betis) is shown the yellow
card for talking out of turn to the referee.
It could have been worse!

Substitution. Cucho Hernandez is replaced
by Cedric Bakambu (Betis).

Manuel Pellegrini prepares a substitution.
Giovani Lo Celso is replaced by Valentin
Gomez (Betis).

That will be all from Antonio Blanco who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Lander
Pinillos Wilson (Alaves).

Referee Adrian Cordero halts the game and
wanders over to the touchline to talk to
Alessio Lisci, then shows him a yellow.

Substitution. Ruben Garcia did his best
and is replaced by Victor Munoz (Osasuna).

Xabi Alonso decides to make a substitution.
Trent Alexander-Arnold will be replaced
by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).

Today's match ends for Brahim Diaz who will
be replaced by Franco Mastantuono (Real
Madrid).

The substitution has been made. Moi Gomez
(Osasuna) has replaced Aimar Oroz.

Xabi Alonso has decided to make a change.
Gonzalo Garcia (Real Madrid) replaces Vinicius
Junior.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Raul Garcia (Osasuna)
comes onto the pitch so that Juan Cruz can
be given a rest.

Kylian Mbappe (Real Madrid) receives a yellow
card from the referee, but it seems like
a very harsh decision.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Arda Guler walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Dani Ceballos (Real Madrid).

Abel Bretones (Osasuna) can have an early
bath after being sent off by the referee
for a tackle that simply has no place in
football!

Goal! Rodrigo Riquelme slips in Aitor Ruibal
(Betis) for a one-on-one with the keeper,
and he simply dinks the ball over him into
the net.

Having seen unsporting behavior, Victor
Garcia shows a yellow card to one of the
players sitting on the bench. And Eder Sarabia
(Elche) is the recipient.

That will be all from Ali Houary who is
being replaced by the fresh legs of Martim
Neto (Elche).

Eder Sarabia prepares a substitution. Alvaro
Rodriguez is replaced by Mourad El Ghezouani
(Elche).

Here comes a substitution. Marc Aguado is
given a rest as he is replaced by Jairo
Izquierdo (Elche).

Substitution. Rodrigo Riquelme will be replaced
by Chimy Avila (Betis).

Manuel Pellegrini has decided to make a
change. Pablo Garcia (Betis) replaces Aitor
Ruibal.

The substitution is prepared. Rafa Mir (Elche)
joins the action as a substitute, replacing
Leo Petrot.

Goal! Martim Neto slips a clever pass through
to German Valera (Elche), who moves inside
the box and sends a measured shot beyond
the keeper and into the bottom left corner.
1:1.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and German Valera walks off the pitch to
be replaced by John Donald (Elche).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Natan (Betis) was quite harsh and Victor
Garcia didn't hesitate to show him a yellow
card.

Manuel Pellegrini decides to make a substitution.
Cucho Hernandez will be replaced by Cedric
Bakambu (Betis).

Julian Alvarez (Atl. Madrid) scores from
a free kick after smashing the ball over
the defensive wall and into the top left
corner of the goal!

Johnny Cardoso (Atl. Madrid) is rightly
booked by the referee because it could not
have been anything other than a yellow card.

Manolo Gonzalez makes a switch. Kike Garcia
(Espanyol) is coming on in place of Ramon
Terrats at the start of the second period.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Manolo
Gonzalez gives a chance to Tyrhys Dolan
(Espanyol) and Jofre is off.

Half-time substitution. Conor Gallagher
will not participate anymore and Pablo Barrios
(Atl. Madrid) is coming on.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Diego Simeone probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Johnny Cardoso. He is replaced by Koke (Atl.
Madrid).

Fernando Calero (Espanyol) violates the
rules and gets a yellow card.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Miguel Rubio (Espanyol)
comes onto the pitch so that Fernando Calero
can be given a rest.

Robin Le Normand (Atl. Madrid) gives the
referee no choice but to show him a yellow
card.

Here is a change. Alex Baena is going off
and Diego Simeone gives the last tactical
orders to Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid).

Here comes a substitution. Thiago Almada
is given a rest as he is replaced by Giacomo
Raspadori (Atl. Madrid).

Marcos Llorente (Atl. Madrid) is awarded
a yellow card.

Miguel Rubio (Espanyol) wins the ball inside
the penalty area after the free kick and
scores with a precise shot into the bottom
right corner!

Omar El Hilali (Espanyol) will have to be
careful for the rest of the match as he
is shown a yellow card.

Manolo Gonzalez has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Pere Milla (Espanyol) replacing
Roberto Fernandez Jaen.

Today's match ends for Julian Alvarez who
will be replaced by Alexander Sorloth (Atl.
Madrid).

Pere Milla (Espanyol) scores from a seemingly
difficult position as he leaps high to head
home a cross, putting the ball beyond the
reach of the goalkeeper.

Manolo Gonzalez has decided to make a change.
Jose Salinas (Espanyol) replaces Javi Puado.

This is a yellow card! Jose Salinas (Espanyol)
is not happy with the decision, but from
our point of view it was clear.

Castrin (Sevilla) is awarded a yellow card
for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree
with the decision, but Francisco Maeso ignores
the protests.

Goal! Nico Williams (Ath Bilbao) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Orjan Nyland into the bottom
right corner.

Lucien Agoume (Sevilla) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Francisco Maeso
had an easy-decision to make.

Nico Williams provides Maroan Sannadi (Ath
Bilbao) with a nice pass inside the box.
It allows him to finish with a low shot
into the middle of the goal.

Matias Almeyda makes a switch. Chidera Ejuke
(Sevilla) is coming on in place of Stanis
Idumbo at the start of the second period.

Juanlu Sanchez produces a killer pass to
release Dodi Lukebakio (Sevilla), who then
unleashes a shot from the edge of the box
and scores! The ball goes in off the left
post, leaving the goalkeeper stranded. 2:1!

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Alex Berenguer trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Robert Navarro
(Ath Bilbao).

Ernesto Valverde has decided to make a change.
Gorka Guruzeta (Ath Bilbao) replaces Maroan
Sannadi.

That's the end of the game for Castrin,
who is replaced by Adnan Januzaj (Sevilla).

Goal! Lucien Agoume (Sevilla) collects a
pass and without hesitation fires an unstoppable
shot inside the left post.

The substitution is prepared. Mikel Vesga
(Ath Bilbao) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Inigo Ruiz de Galarreta.

Goal! Robert Navarro (Ath Bilbao) unleashes
a first-time shot from inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper inside the right post.
3:2.

Substitution. Nemanja Gudelj walks off the
pitch and Marcao (Sevilla) comes on as a
substitute.

Ernesto Valverde has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Alejandro Rego (Ath Bilbao)
replacing Nico Williams.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Jesus Areso walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Andoni Gorosabel (Ath Bilbao).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Isaac Romero (Sevilla)
is coming onto the pitch as Djibril Sow
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Christantus Uche (Getafe) goes into the
book for a horrible tackle. A yellow card
is necessary in this case.

Goal! Christantus Uche produces a great
pass that finds Adrian Liso (Getafe) inside
the penalty area, who takes advantage of
the situation to rifle a shot into the bottom
right corner. 0:1.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Williot Swedberg (Celta Vigo) was quite
harsh and Iosu Galech didn't hesitate to
show him a yellow card.

Here is a change. Fran Beltran is going
off and Claudio Giraldez gives the last
tactical orders to Hugo Sotelo (Celta Vigo).

Substitution. Jones El Abdellaoui (Celta
Vigo) has come on for Williot Swedberg.

A substitution has been made. Mihailo Ristic
goes off and Bryan Zaragoza (Celta Vigo)
comes on.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Borja Iglesias (Celta
Vigo) will replace Ferran Jutgla.

Christantus Uche (Getafe) beats the offside
trap and bears down on goal. With just the
keeper to beat he coolly shoots past him
from the edge of the box.

Alex Sola (Getafe) joins the action as a
substitute, replacing Adrian Liso.
David Soria (Getafe) picks up a caution.

Claudio Giraldez has decided to substitute
Yoel Lago and he is replaced by Pablo Duran
(Celta Vigo).

Javier Rodriguez (Celta Vigo) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Iosu Galech
had an easy-decision to make.
Marcos Alonso (Celta Vigo) is booked.

Manu Sanchez (Levante) receives a harsh
yellow card from the referee after committing
a minor foul on his opponent.

Toni Martinez (Alaves) heads the ball into
the top left corner after a splendid cross.
This timely header produces a wonderful
moment.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Jose Morales (Levante) replaces
Victor Garcia.

The ball bounces off the defender and lands
at the feet of Jeremy Toljan (Levante) who
unleashes a shot behind the keeper and into
the net.

Substitution. Pablo Ibanez did his best
and is replaced by Mariano Diaz (Alaves).

Eduardo Coudet prepares a substitution.
Jon Guridi is replaced by Abderrahmane Rebbach
(Alaves).

Julian Calero has decided to make a change.
Diego Varela Pampin (Levante) replaces Manu
Sanchez.

The manager makes a subsitution with Sergio
Lozano (Levante) coming on for Ivan Romero.

Substitution. Pablo Martinez Andres makes
way for Matias Moreno (Levante).

Julian Calero has decided to substitute
Roger Brugue and he is replaced by Carlos
Alvarez (Levante).

It will be a substitution. Calebe (Alaves)
is ready to enter the pitch as Carlos Vicente
walks off.

Eduardo Coudet has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Yusi (Alaves) replacing
Victor Parada.

Here comes a substitution. Carles Alena
is given a rest as he is replaced by Ander
Guevara (Alaves).

What a hit! Nahuel Tenaglia (Alaves) shows
good composure inside the box to fire a
first-time shot into the top of the net.
2:1.
Jose Gaya (Valencia) picks up a yellow card.

Jose Sanchez shows the yellow card to Benat
Turrientes (Real Sociedad) for a heavy challenge.

Goal! Dani Raba puts a cross into the box
and finds Diego Lopez (Valencia), who latches
on to it and strikes the ball into the bottom
right corner. He makes it 1:0.

Goal - 1:1! Brais Mendez tees up Takefusa
Kubo (Real Sociedad) inside the box and
he rolls the ball into the bottom right
corner and past Julen Agirrezabala.

Aihen Munoz (Real Sociedad) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jose Sanchez
didn't think twice about pulling it out
of his pocket.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Andre Almeida (Valencia)
will replace Dani Raba.

Carlos Corberan has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Arnaut Danjuma (Valencia)
replacing Hugo Duro.

Substitution. Brais Mendez makes his way
off the pitch and Orri Oskarsson (Real Sociedad)
comes on as his replacement.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Duje Caleta-Car trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Aritz Elustondo
(Real Sociedad).

Carlos Corberan has decided to substitute
Jose Gaya and he is replaced by Jesus Vazquez
(Valencia).

Substitution. Baptiste Santamaria (Valencia)
has come on for Pepelu.

That's the end of the game for Benat Turrientes,
who is replaced by Urko Gonzalez (Real Sociedad).

Substitution. Aihen Munoz will be replaced
by Sergio Gomez (Real Sociedad).

Sergio Francisco prepares a substitution.
Takefusa Kubo is replaced by Goncalo Guedes
(Real Sociedad).

We are about to witness a subsitution. Filip
Ugrinic (Valencia) for Javi Guerra.

It's a goal! Lamine Yamal sends a long raking
pass onto the head of Raphinha (Barcelona),
who makes no mistake from close in and sends
the ball into the bottom left corner. 0:1.

Mateu Morey Bauza (Mallorca) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jose Munuera
didn't think twice about pulling it out
of his pocket.

Goal! Ferran Torres (Barcelona) picks up
the ball from a rebound and from the edge
of the box he unleashes a shot into the
top left corner. 0:2.

Manu Morlanes (Mallorca) uses the wrong
choice of words while trying to explain
something to the referee and receives a
yellow card for dissent.

Jose Munuera blows his whistle and Manu
Morlanes (Mallorca) is shown a second yellow
card for his foul. His manager will not
be pleased. He has lot of time to think
about it as he walks off.

Pablo Torre (Mallorca) sees a yellow card
from Jose Munuera after he sent one of the
opposing players to the ground.

Raphinha (Barcelona) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Jose Munuera
ignores the protests.

Hansi Flick makes a switch. Dani Olmo (Barcelona)
is coming on in place of Fermin Lopez at
the start of the second period.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Jagoba Arrasate probably
wasn't satisfied with the performance of
Pablo Torre. He is replaced by Daniel Rodriguez
(Mallorca).

Jagoba Arrasate has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Omar Mascarell
(Mallorca) comes on the pitch for Mateu
Morey Bauza.

Half-time substitution. Takuma Asano will
not participate anymore and Mateo Joseph
(Mallorca) is coming on.

Substitution. Jofre Torrents (Barcelona)
in, Alejandro Balde out.

Here is a change. Pau Cubarsi is going off
and Hansi Flick gives the last tactical
orders to Gavi (Barcelona).

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Ferran Torres walks off the pitch to
be replaced by Marcus Rashford (Barcelona).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Jules Kounde (Barcelona)
is coming onto the pitch as Raphinha cannot
continue after picking up an injury.

The referee signals a substitution. Jan
Salas (Mallorca) is brought on as a substitute
for Sergi Darder.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Johan Mojica departs the
field of play to be replaced by Toni Lato
(Mallorca).

Lamine Yamal (Barcelona) receives a precise
pass inside the box from Gavi and he beats
the goalkeeper with a brilliant shot into
the top left corner. 0:3.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Junior Reis (Villarreal) was quite harsh
and Alejandro Ruiz didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Salomon Rondon (R. Oviedo) misses the penalty
after the goalkeeper anticipates the direction
of the shot and makes an excellent save!

It's like he was asking for a caution. Alberto
Reina (R. Oviedo) receives a yellow card.

Alberto Reina (R. Oviedo) must have known
he would be sent off for this foul, but
he had to stop the opponent at all costs.
Alejandro Ruiz shows him a second yellow
card and the game has ended for him.

Etta Eyong (Villarreal) gets to a rebound
inside the six-yard box and produces a header.
He manages to put the ball into the bottom
left corner, and thus alter the score to
1:0.

Goal! Nicolas Pepe plays a short, square
pass into the path of Pape Gueye (Villarreal),
who bends a shot straight into the bottom
right corner to make it 2:0. Fabulous goal!

Veljko Paunovic makes a switch. Marco Esteban
(R. Oviedo) is coming on in place of Haissem
Hassan at the start of the second period.

Gerard Moreno is substituted due to injury.
Marcelino gives a chance to Tajon Buchanan
(Villarreal).

That's the end of the game for Salomon Rondon,
who is replaced by Federico Vinas (R. Oviedo).

Here's the change. Juan Foyth leaves the
pitch and Alberto Moleiro (Villarreal) comes
on as a substitute.

Here is a change. Pape Gueye is going off
and Marcelino gives the last tactical orders
to Dani Parejo (Villarreal).

Luka Ilic goes off the pitch and Borja Sanchez
(R. Oviedo) comes on.

Veljko Paunovic has decided to substitute
Ilyas Chaira and he is replaced by Omar
Falah (R. Oviedo).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Alfonso Pedraza (Villarreal)
comes onto the pitch so that Nicolas Pepe
can be given a rest.

Marcelino has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Thomas Partey (Villarreal) replacing
Santi Comesana.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rahim Alhassane departs
the field of play to be replaced by Santi
Cazorla (R. Oviedo).

That's a clear yellow card. Luiz Felipe
(Rayo Vallecano) goes into the book.

GOAL! Jorge de Frutos (Rayo Vallecano) scores
easily from close in after he is presented
with the ball on a golden platter after
the goalkeeper slips. It’s 0:1.

Goal! Alvaro Garcia (Rayo Vallecano) scores
after an assist by Jorge de Frutos that
allowed him to tap in the ball into an empty
net. The score is 0:2.

Paulo Gazzaniga (Girona) is awarded a red
card due to his behaviour.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Bojan Miovski as he
is replaced by Vladyslav Krapyvtsov (Girona).

Goal! Isi Palazon (Rayo Vallecano) wins
the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Martin Juan Carlos into the
bottom right corner.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Michel probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Yaser
Asprilla. He is replaced by Portu (Girona).

Half-time substitution. Luiz Felipe will
not participate anymore and Pelayo Fernandez
(Rayo Vallecano) is coming on.

Goal! Viktor Tsygankov manages to prod the
ball to Joel Roca (Girona) after a melee
inside the box, and he needs no second invitation
to slot the ball into the left side of the
goal. 1:3.

Substitution. Arnau Martinez makes his way
off the pitch and Hugo Rincon (Girona) comes
on as his replacement.

Michel decides to make a substitution. Daley
Blind will be replaced by Vitor Reis (Girona).

It will be a substitution. Thomas Lemar
(Girona) is ready to enter the pitch as
Yangel Herrera walks off.

Here is a change. Pedro Diaz is going off
and Inigo Perez gives the last tactical
orders to Gerard Gumbau (Rayo Vallecano).

Inigo Perez has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Oscar Valentin (Rayo Vallecano)
replacing Unai Lopez.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Randy Nteka (Rayo Vallecano) is replacing
Jorge de Frutos.

A substitution has been made. Alvaro Garcia
goes off and Pacha (Rayo Vallecano) comes
on.

van de Beek D.
